reviewText: Usually my reviews need to be a little long-winded to explain, but this, this is just funny, and without a doubt excellent! I agree with another reviewer calling this show "Perfection". I have not yet finished watching all episodes, but I saw them on the Hub channel. To wait to review this at the end would be a shame to rush the episode set. Video and sound very nice for standard DVD, obviously it helps that it's a current show. All episodes are easily good but it still manages to have some high points: "Dan VS Technology", "Dan VS the Animal Shelter", "Dan VS the Ninja". Only a bit surprised there was no blu ray released, but the video is so well taken care of, this one might be in a category by itself for not needing it. But I can still group this near "Code Geass" for wondering how blu ray could give it more. Code Geass is my one absolute choice for what could be totally outstanding if ever enhanced by blu ray quality. I think that one is really the one that needs to show what the best of blu ray can do!So see Dan VS, and when you see it I hope you will be one of the dedicated Super Fans who saw picking up the DVD as a necessity.
Title: N/A

reviewText: A great first season to a phenomenally fun series.The premise is of one man Dan a man who has it out for the world.Everything sets this guy off and it leads to funny conclusions to some of the minor gripes of life.For example Dan gets his car scratched and figures it was a wolf man that did the damage to it, and the big reveal? A wolf-man scratched his car.The show indulges in delightful insanity.The animations is alright, pretty good for a flash cartoon but can use some level of improvement as well.I enjoy the shows humor that sometimes dives into the dark humor and hits the comedic cord.I believe that people should sit down and give the show a watch and believe they will enjoy it.i believe Dan would approve this review speaking his praises of how a delightful funny character he is.

reviewText: I really like this show. Dan is like me, how the world is against us and we want them to pay for pissing us off. I refuse to accept the show is cancelled! It will come back with a new season!

reviewText: For some reason, I just love this show. Apparently it's aimed at kids, but I'm 19 and I always get a kick out of it. The main character, Dan, is such a bitter, short, pathetic jerk of an anti-hero that you can't help but love him. His "sidekick" Chris is a funny character as well, despite his normal-ness. Elise, I can take or leave - the more Dan getting into his hilariously overblown wars with inanimate objects, sports, countries, what have you, the better. If you don't feel like spending your money, check it out on the Hub or try to sneak a look online. It's a thoroughly enjoyable show, in my humble opinion, mainly because of that jerk Dan. I'm excited it's coming out on DVD and will definitely own it as soon as possible! Woohoo!
